did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Jack Kilgour Collection of Association of Cornell Employees (ACE) Records, 1969-1970
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Planning documents, notes, clippings, and other printed material relating to Association of Cornell Employees (ACE) - Libraries, a unit proposed to represent nonprofessional, nonsupervisory library staff employees on the Ithaca campus of Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of planning documents, notes, clippings, and other printed material relating to Association of Cornell Employees (ACE) - Libraries, a unit proposed to represent nonprofessional, nonsupervisory library staff employees on the Ithaca campus of Cornell University.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Jack Kilgour Collection of Association of Cornell Employees (ACE) Records #5184. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
